title: Herb Roast Chicken
ingredients: ['250ml chicken stock', '1 (1.8kg) whole chicken, rinsed and patted dry', '115g butter, cut into 1 tablespoon sized pieces', '2 large oranges, halved', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '115g butter, melted', '2 sprigs fresh rosemary', '2 sprigs fresh thyme', '2 sprigs fresh sage']
